meanings.definition: A person who is especially competent to pass critical judgments in an art, particularly one of the fine arts, or in matters of taste.
meanings.sent1: As a connoisseur of paintings, she could easily distinguish between different art styles.
meanings.sent2: The wine connoisseur could identify the grape variety with just one sip.
meanings.sent3: The connoisseur of desserts declared the chocolate cake to be a masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: She was a connoisseur of fashion, always able to spot the latest trends.
meanings.sent5: The connoisseur's keen eye for detail made them a sought-after art critic.

meanings.definition: A person with a high degree of knowledge or skill in a particular area.
meanings.sent1: He was a connoisseur of cars, able to repair any model with ease.
meanings.sent2: The connoisseur of technology could troubleshoot any computer issue.
meanings.sent3: The connoisseur of puzzles solved the crossword in record time.
meanings.sent4: She was a connoisseur of literature, having read every classic novel.
meanings.sent5: The connoisseur of plants could identify any species by just looking at the leaves.
